text: hi, anyway to show a datepicker in a custom post field?
this is a custom field created with export_to_template_context  -> {% text "event_date_test" label="Fecha del evento", value="20/04/2017", export_to_template_context=True %}
anyway to parse a date "d/m/Y" to "Y/m/d" or directly to timestamp ?
got it working with a macro
thanks <@U25PYL3Q8>, my files starting refreshing in the afternoon, but I’ll make sure to try that out in the future if it happens
When using the create page api, <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/pages/post_pages>
Are you able to add body content?  I see it only returns a status, I would hope it would return the page ID
so if it doesn't return a page ID, how can I reference the page created later?
using postman I did a quick page create to the demo

Access-Control-Allow-Credentials →false
Connection →keep-alive
Content-Encoding →gzip
Content-Length →678
Content-Type →application/json; charset=UTF-8
Date →Fri, 07 Jul 2017 19:58:41 GMT
Vary →Accept-Encoding, User-Agent
X-Trace →1BFC4590A25BCA1401182A8D3EE7EB8876E51F47B5BAF2A6BADFEE82C6
x-HubSpot-new-object-id →5243896182
That is what I got in return. is the x-HubSpot-new-object-id going to be the page id?
yes, that is teh page ID
